item.title: (Will be online in 1-2 weeks) The effects of risk and networking on spending
item.description: Abstract This article focuses on one of the oldest and most pivotal of our club's projects. Once completed, this app will process data on everything from the risk and profitting patterns of teens at LAHS, to popularity trends of school events. Stay online for more updates here!

item.title: Ocean Biodiversity and Economy
item.description: Abstract UNCLOS (United Nations Convention on the Law Of the Sea) has been in force since its 9 year-long ratification, starting in the early 70s. It is a treaty signed with nearly every nation on earth (the US being a big exception) in order to regulate the oceanic affairs of its member states. These include military and political activites. UNCLOS has been groundbreaking in creating a new legal code for the sea, desigating our oceans (rightfully) as the Common Heritage of mankind.
